info: Transfer is processed via Polymarket Relayer (gasless). The transaction will be submitted immediately but may take a few minutes to confirm on-chain.
submitted: Transfer request submitted successfully. You can track the transaction status on PolygonScan.
title: Internal Transfer
toWalletHint: Select a wallet to transfer funds to
walletActivating: Your wallet needs to be activated before transfer. The activation and transfer will be processed automatically. This may take a few minutes. You can check the wallet address on PolygonScan to monitor progress.
